HeroMission.Hero_UnlockArea002_Child_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="35bdc3c445384fabb3a2b64ad0195ff1" Scale="1"/]回收[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]{NextNum}個宇宙船零件[System:Color name="Default"]
修復多露芬號的話，
一定能夠提升引擎輸出功率吧⋯⋯
HeroMission.Hero_UnlockArea003_Child_02_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="d0473eda61a04f0691f65e602803b017" Scale="1"/]若想擴大可探索的區域，
必須回收[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]{NextNum}個宇宙船零件[System:Color name="Default"]⋯⋯
HeroMission.Hero_UnlockArea010_Child_03_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="07cebef3c2f7476380119c012db49cac" Scale="1"/]要進一步提升多露芬號的飛行距離，
需要多達[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]{NextNum}個宇宙船零件[System:Color name="Default"]⋯⋯
HeroMission.Hero_UnlockEnding_Child_04_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="7d081c2d36b745a7ae5be58d348812ce" Scale="1"/]如果回收全部[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]{NextNum}個[System:Color name="Default"][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]宇宙船零件[System:Color name="Default"]的話，
一定能夠從這個行星逃脫！
HeroMission.Hero_UnlockEnding_Child_04_Purpose: [Npc:Icon chara="Dummy"/][UE:Meta key="cc9bef0af3ee4280b831d122dad8ac4b" Scale="1"/]回收所有的宇宙船零件
